I'll wear it when I'm sick, or sick and in bed, at home and around the cats, but wouldn't feel comfortable wearing it out and about where other humans might see me in it.

I've been trying to find an AFFORDABLE long-sleeve waffle shirt for a while now to match the one I was given as a gift years back by Faded Glory (when they made decent ones that kept you warm), but could never find any. I have found similar looking ones that some brands offer, but never made the purchase because I felt they charged way more for what the shirt was worth (no way I'm playing $30 or more for 1 shirt).  I came across this long-sleeve recently and I was skeptical because it was an Amazon brand product and I wasn't convinced that Amazon could make decent clothing (especially something that I've been looking years for). I ended up ordering 2 black ones anyway because I didn't have anything to lose at this point and reading some of the other reviews gave me some hope.  When they finally arrived, I was surprised on the quality of them. They aren't as thick as my old Faded Glory shirt, but surprisingly they kept me warm and were just the right fit. I'd say they are good enough for anyone who are looking for these types of shirts to give them a try. I'll likely buy a few more in the future as I'm very impress and say the price is worth it  (NOTE: Ordered 2 Large and they are true to fit. I usually wear a large in my other shirts. XL would have been too big and after washing and sending them through the dryer, the shirts DID NOT shrink).
This shirt is a nice weight for fall or spring temps and a good layer under another shirt for winter.  It has washed and dried well and held its shape/size.  It is also true to size.
My husband is tall and prefers shirts that don't come up when he raises his arms. This is prefect. It's thick and warm.
Boyfriend loves it. He uses these shirts everyday under his work clothes and it helps to keep him warm.

I love this shirt, its not thin, not heavy.  Some reviews call it a sweater, definitely not imo.  Its a thin-middleweight long sleeve shirt, almost like a thermal you wear to bed.  Im 5'7" 140 and the small fits very well.  I usually get medium.  The only con for me is the sleeve ends are cut too wide for me.  5 stars still, I like the look and texture.  PS.  the light grey is darker than the pic, which I like.

They make terrific shirts for weekends, date nights and even work (if your company permits it).
